Articles.Content: Roger, thanks for suggestion. Will be implemented in 1.3 update.

Great, looking forward to it! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")

A bit of an old thread, but is this ever going to update to 1.3?

> 
> 2 hours ago, DarkOwl57 said:
> 
> 
> A bit of an old thread, but is this ever going to update to 1.3?

It's just parts it should work fine 1.3.1
Mod works perfectly in 1.3.1. If you have any concerns / issues you find, please post in this thread. Thank you.

Hi dude, any progress on the 1x2 glass pane?  

Also another quick suggestion, what about making a frameless 1x1? Just so people can make their own panes the shape and size they want?

**Edited <time datetime="2017-12-17T02:02:33Z" title="12/17/2017 02:02  AM" data-short="6 yr">December 17, 2017</time> by AdrianK.**

Tested mod again on version 1.3.1.  

I plan on getting back to this mod within a week or so. My apologies for the prolonged break!  

**Update v1.9.1:**

**- 1.3.1 compatibility confirmed**

Mod is compatible with version 1.4.1.

Damage system! =)

is this mod still going ? i truely hope so , glass looks invisible in dx11 mode , and triangles are still broke and the tweakscale doesnt find it anymore ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif ":(")
Amazing mod, however the textures for the glass are buggy, and by that I mean they keep flickering from semi - transparent to fully transparent.
(im playing on 1.3.1 by the way)

~~does this work by any chance on 1.6.1?~~ it does work on 1.6.1 but still got the flickery triangle glass.

**Edited <time datetime="2019-04-08T10:54:57Z" title="04/08/2019 10:54  AM" data-short="5 yr">April 8, 2019</time> by fruitsbar**
um, does this work for 1.7.1?

> 
> 
> 10 minutes ago, GreyWolf said:
> 
> 
> um, does this work for 1.7.1?
> 

Try it and find out!  Report back to let us know.

> 
> 
> 17 hours ago, Gargamel said:
> 
> 
> Try it and find out!  Report back to let us know.
> 

just tested in 1.7.1 and forced dx11 (using textures unlimited dll)....... ok well , triangles are still glitched , but all panels apart from 1x1 textures seem fine , domes and tubes are also fine you can just use the 4x4 panel and tweakscale it anyway lol , i'd say this mod officialy works in 1.7.1 and im happy for it ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")
